spec_data.Name: perl-IO-Capture
spec_data.Description:
The IO::Capture Module defines an abstract base class that can be used
to create any number of useful sub-classes that capture output being
sent on a filehandle such as STDOUT or STDERR.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:25:02 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Abstract Base Class to build modules to capture output
